title: Participatory democracy index
subtitle: Based on the expert estimates and index by [V-Dem](#dod:v-dem), weighted by countries' populations. It combines information on suffrage, the freedom and fairness of elections, freedoms of association and expression, as well as the extent to which citizens can engage in regional and local government, civil society organizations and direct democracy. It ranges from 0 to 1 (most democratic).
